## CardContainer.add() method

Add a single card to the default place in this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
add(card: TCard): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  card | TCard | Card to add. |

**Returns:**

void
